alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:02PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHITA...SOUTHEASTERN ROGER MILLS...WESTERN CUSTER AND NORTHEASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Foss Reservoir, moving northeast at 25 mph. Butler mesonet gusted to 72 mph at 6:55 pm. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Cordell, Burns Flat, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Butler, Carter, Bessie, Foss, Foss Reservoir, Berlin, and Stafford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
